qas.question: How many German Americans are there?
How many Germans live in Brazil?
How many people in the world have German heritage?
America is home to what percentage of German decedent people?
How many people of German  decent live in the Americas?
How many German speaking people live in Brazil?
How many German speaking people live around the world?

plausible_answers.text: Canada, Argentina, South Africa and France

qas.question: What countries claim 1 million people of German descent between them?

context: People of German origin are found in various places around the globe. United States is home to approximately <a0_0><b4_0>50 million<b4_0/><a0_0/> German Americans or <a3_0>one third<a3_0/> of the German diaspora, making it the largest centre of German-descended people outside Germany. Brazil is the second largest with <a1_0><b5_0>5 million<b5_0/><a1_0/> people claiming German ancestry. Other significant centres are <b7_0>Canada, Argentina, South Africa and France<b7_0/> each accounting for at least 1 million. While the exact number of German-descended people is difficult to calculate, the available data makes it safe to claim the number is exceeding <a2_0><b6_0>100 million<b6_0/><a2_0/> people.
